dict.acceptation: 使有资格；给…定名；给与…权利；称做；

sent.orig: The documents which you have entitle you to drawback for duties paid.
sent.trans: 你拥有的这些文件使你有权退税。

sent.orig: Their qualifications entitle them to a higher salary.
sent.trans: 他们的资格使他们可以得到较高的薪金。

sent.orig: Tickets of the Navigation Co. entitle the holder to break the journey at London and Paris.
sent.trans: 该轮船公司的船票容许持票人在伦敦和巴黎滞留。

sent.orig: Cheque which entitle the person who have it to is pay.
sent.trans: 给支票持有人获得付款权利的支票。

sent.orig: How does one entitle the queen when speaking directly to her?
sent.trans: 直接同女王讲话时，我们该怎样称呼她呢？
